commands.name: az repos policy case-enforcement create
az repos policy case-enforcement update
commands.syntax:
az repos policy case-enforcement update --id
                                        [--blocking {false, true}]
                                        [--detect {false, true}]
                                        [--enabled {false, true}]
                                        [--org]
                                        [--project]
                                        [--repository-id]
